snippet: FIFA provisionally barred the departing executive committee member Chuck Blazer of the United States from soccer-related activities for 90 days after he was accused of embezzlement.
abstract: FIFA provisionally bars departing executive committee member Chuck Blazer of United States from soccer-related activities for 90 days after he is accused of embezzlement; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: FIFA provisionally barred the departing executive committee member Chuck Blazer of the United States from soccer-related activities for 90 days after he was accused of embezzlement.

headline.seo: FIFA Bars Chuck Blazer Accused of Embezzlement
headline.main: FIFA Bars Executive Accused of Embezzlement
